night.text: It is clearing up. Before midnight in southern part rain and sleet locally. Westerly wind 3-9, on northeastern coast in gusts to 13 m/s. Air temperature falling -1..-6°C, on the windward coast to +2°C. Slippery roads!
night.sea:
Forecast for Baltic Sea valid 24 hours from 13:00 UTC Jan 1 to 13:00 UTC Jan 2, 2023.
Weather summary: ridge of High moving from Scandinavia over Baltic Sea eastwards.
No warnings
Northern Baltic: northerly, at night becoming around south 3-8 m/s, tomorrow by day southeast, south 5-10, in gusts 13 m/s. Rain locally, tomorrow by day rainy. Visibility moderate or good.
Northern Gulf of Riga, Moonsund: westerly becoming at night southeast 3-8 m/s, tomorrow by day southeast 3-8 m/s. Rain in many places, at night reducing. Visibility moderate.
Gulf of Finland: west, northwest 5-10, at night in eastern part in gusts up to 14 m/s, by morning decreasing and during day backing southeast 3-8 m/s. Mostly dry. Visibility moderate or good.
night.peipsi: Westerly wind 3-8 m/s. Mostly dry. Visibility good to moderate. Air temperature -4..-6°C.

day.text: It is clouding up. In afternoon an area of rain and sleet spreading over Southern and Western Estonia, locally snow and freesinnnnnnnnnnng rain too. Risk of glaze. Westerly wind backing southeast 3-8 m/s. Air temperature rising in Western Estonia 0..+4, in eastern part 0..-3°C.
day.peipsi: Westerly wind 3-8 m/s, in afternoon backing southeast. Mostly dry. Visibility good to moderate. Air temperature -2..-4°C.

night.text: Overcast. Sleet, rain, in northeastern part also snow, towards morning it is going to snow in Central and Northern part of Estonia also. Risk of glaze. Southeast, east 4-10 m/s, backing by morning northerly direction. Air temperature -3..+3°C.

day.text: mainly cloudy. In many places sleet and snow, locally also rain. Mainly northerly 2-8, on islands increasing in gusts to 14 m/s. Air temperature -2..+2°C. Slippery roads!

night.text: Cloudy with clear spells. Snow in many places. Variable win
